item.title: Biden, Harris hail Medicare drug price cuts that will save billions - Reuters
item.description:
1. Biden, Harris hail Medicare drug price cuts that will save billions  Reuters
  2. Medicare costs lowered for 10 drugs, including diabetes prescriptions  NBC News
  3. FACT SHEET: Biden-Harris Administration Announces New, Lower Prices for First Ten Drugs Selected for Medicare Price Negotiation to Lower Costs for Millions of Americans  The White House
  4. White House says prescription drug deals will produce billions in savings for taxpayers, seniors  The Associated Press
  5. Medicare negotiated drug prices for the first time. Here’s what it got  NPR

item.title: World on brink of third world war: Russian MP Mikhail Sheremet
item.description: A Russian parliamentary deputy stated that the world was on the edge of a third world war due to Ukraine's incursion into Russia’s Kursk region. He highlighted the involvement of Western military equipment and foreign participation. Meanwhile, North Korea expressed support for Russia, amid allegations of China, Iran, and North Korea aiding Russia's war efforts.

item.title: Pakistan: Nawaz Sharif urges govt to address soaring electricity bills issue
item.description: Nawaz Sharif directed Shehbaz Sharif and Maryam Nawaz to collaborate in addressing rising electricity bills, which is vital for the PML-N's revival. During a party meeting, he emphasized reducing electricity prices and reactivating the party. The meeting also discussed local body elections and restoring previous local body laws, criticizing the PTI government for inflation and high bills.

item.title: Trump claims Biden 'hates' Obama and 'crazy' Pelosi more than him
item.description: Former President Donald Trump accused President Joe Biden of having more resentment toward Barack Obama and Nancy Pelosi than toward him. Trump cited Biden's relegation to a less significant speaking slot at the Democratic National Convention as evidence. Trump also claimed that Kamala Harris is distancing herself from Biden, suggesting internal tensions within the Democratic Party.

item.title: NSW Liberal party claims nomination failure ‘will not define us’ after sacking director and promising refunds
item.description:
Administrative bungle leaves party without a senior leader, four weeks out from statewide council elections

  • Follow our Australia news live blog for latest updates
  • Get our morning and afternoon news emails, free app or daily news podcast

The New South Wales Liberal party is “thoroughly investigating” its failure to lodge nominations for more than 130 council candidates after sacking the state director over the administrative disaster.

The party is promising refunds after its head office missed the Wednesday deadline to lodge the necessary paperwork to nominate all of its candidates for the local government elections on 14 September.

Sign up for Guardian Australia’s free morning and afternoon email newsletters for your daily news roundup

Continue reading...

item.title: Former Liberal MP Craig Laundy close to settling lawsuit with ex staffer he had affair with, court hears
item.description:
Judge says the matter is settled in principle at a brief hearing attended by Laundy and his former staffer, lawyer Natalie Baini

  • Get our morning and afternoon news emails, free app or daily news podcast

Ex-Liberal minister Craig Laundy, his wife and his daughter have almost settled a lawsuit by his former staffer who alleged she was threatened, lied about and harassed, a court had heard.

Lawyer Natalie Baini had been a ministerial staffer for the Liberal Party when she formed a romantic relationship with the married Laundy.

Continue reading...

item.title: Israel-Gaza war live: Israeli operations in Gaza an obstacle to ceasefire progress, Hamas says
item.description:
A US official briefed on the discussions in Doha said Thursday’s talks were ‘constructive’

The Israeli army ordered a fresh evacuation of areas in southern and central Gaza previously designated as a humanitarian safe zone on Friday, saying the areas had been used by Hamas as a base for firing mortars and rockets towards Israel.

It said warning flyers and text messages had been sent out in the area north of the southern city of Khan Younis and in the eastern part of Deir Al-Balah, where tens of thousands of people have sought shelter from fighting in other parts of Gaza.

Continue reading...

item.title: Biden Unloads on Trump Like Never Before
Congresswoman Anna Paulina Luna addresses viral MAGA swimsuit video
Hidden-camera video shows Project 2025 co-author discussing his secret work preparing for a second Trump term
